column2: b'Girls & Panzer: Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza - Extra'

b'In honor of Girls & Panzer TV & OVA receiving a 5.1ch Blu-ray Disc BOX set, a new Akiyama Yukari\'s Tank Course "Extra" was made with nearly a half hour worth of content. \n\nA short ~7 minute watermarked \'preview\' version was available on Bandai Namco\'s official YouTube Channel on September 29, 2018.'
[b'Girls & Panzer', b'Girls & Panzer: Kore ga Hontou no Anzio-sen Desu!']
